Addressing these disparities requires targeted public health 
interventions and policies to improve access to nutritious 
foods and prenatal care for all pregnant women. 
Hydration and pregnancy 
Adequate hydration is vital during pregnancy to support 
increased blood volume, amniotic fluid levels, and overall 
maternal health. Pregnant women should aim to consume 
at least 8-10 glass
